Uses of Class
bgu.dcr.az.api.agt.SimpleAgent

  • Packages that use SimpleAgent 
    Package Description
    bgu.dcr.az.api.exen  
    bgu.dcr.az.api.tools  

    • Uses of SimpleAgent in bgu.dcr.az.api.exen

      Methods in bgu.dcr.az.api.exen with parameters of type SimpleAgent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AgentRunner.nest(int originalAgentId, SimpleAgent nestedAgent, ContinuationMediator cmed)
      this method supports the nested agents feature, an nested agent can call this method to "change the skin" of the agent with $originalAgentId as for this moment all the messages that will get sent by this type of agent (type = upper level class) will received by this new nested agent, you should only nest agent of the same type once - means let A, B, C be agent types , if A 'nested in' B 'nested in' C then A!=B, A!=C, B!=C (all the types are different).
